headline: Computer Vision, Image Processing
texts: Computer Vision is the field that I am most interested in.
I think this is an interesting field, it has a lot of potential in it. My favorite topics are segmentation, object detection and tracking.
I made variable projects in these topics, and Im always open for consume content and discussion about this field.

headline: Web Development
texts: This is the field that I have the most experience.
Im working as a full stack web developer since 2021, and a have experience in various stacks. For example python-flask, .Net, React with Typescript, or GO Fiber.
Im always interested in topics related this field, and Im always open for learning new topics in it.

headline: Data Science
texts: I learned data science at university and I really liked it.
I made several project, like sport analytics, web scraping and time series analysis.
I like every topic in this field, especially that topics that are more close to programming and engineering. Im not a big fan of visualization and topics like this.

headline: Web3
texts: Im highly interested in web3 topics, but I have not much experience in it.
I made a smart contract project back in the day at university, and I highly enjoyed it.
Im always open for discussion about this field, and Im open for projects that can give me some experience.

headline: Databases
texts: Im a big data guy, I like data science, AI and of course data storing and managing in general.
I have a lot of experience in SQL databases and in the last year I started working with NoSql databases like MongoDB or Redis.
Im really like to talk about best practices and trick about boost performance when dealing with big/unstructured data.
